derivation: (Aramaic) or אֲפַרְסַתְכַי; (Aramaic), of foreign origin (only in the plural);
outline:
Apharsachites = "as causers of division (?)"Apharsathchites = "I will divide the deceivers (?)"
  1. (CLBL) an unknown office
  2. (BDB) perhaps an office or an official
  3. (TWOT)
    1. a people
    2. perhaps a title of an official
strongs_def: an Apharsekite or Apharsathkite, an unknown Assyrian tribe
